text: niccayamaka yutarkalaiyum, inaivaippavarkalaiyum muhminkalukkuk katum pakaivarkalakave (napiye!) Nir kanpir. "Niccayamaka nankal kiristavarkalaka irukkinrom" enru colpavarkalai, muhminkalukku necattal mikavum nerunkiyavarkalaka (napiye!) Nir kanpir. Enenral avarkalil karrarinta kurumarkalum, turavikalum irukkinranar. Melum avarkal irumappuk kolvatumillai
